1. Google brings AI answers to map applications  Reuters
  2. New in Maps: Inspiration curated with Gemini, enhanced navigation and more  The Keyword
  3. Google Maps’ enhanced navigation will make sure you’re in the right lane  The Verge
  4. Generative AI is coming to Google Maps, Google Earth, Waze  Ars Technica
  5. Google Maps Gets the Long Overdue Update That Makes It the Best Navigation App  autoevolution
